entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 01:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
